### Create a tag

1. Create a lightweight or an annotated tag named `v1.0.0`.

### Create a GitHub Release

1. Go to your repository on GitHub.
1. Click on "Releases" then "Draft a new release".
1. Choose the tag `v1.0.0` from the list or create a new tag.
1. Fill in the release title and description.
1. Click "Publish release".

### Link a Zenodo record

1. Connect your GitHub repository to Zenodo.
1. Follow Zenodo's instructions to link your repository:
    - Go to Zenodo and log in.
    - Go to the "GitHub" tab in your Zenodo settings.
    - Enable the repository for Zenodo integration.
1. Create a new release on GitHub to trigger Zenodo to archive your repository and mint a DOI.
